data.title: Purple Paint Colors
data.meta_description: Browse the Benjamin Moore Purple paint color family and inspire imagination, spirituality and abundance in your space.
data.text:
From soft violet to deep aubergine, purple paint offers a range of hues that complement any home. Many light purple hues can replace gray in a neutral color scheme, while deeper hues provide a dramatic backdrop. Create a tranquil space using light lavenders and lilacs in a modern bedroom.

Luxurious purple paint colors like rich eggplants and plum hues are perfect for statement-making living rooms and dining rooms. Pair violet hues with blues for a calming, analogous combination, or create a complementary scheme by combining a deep mulberry with pale yellow.
